main-text:
It's more accessible
Built-in Accessibility Options make Windows 95 more accessible to
everyone.

 - Large fonts, high-contrast color schemes, large mouse
pointers, and pointer trails make your screen easier to read.


 - FilterKeys, StickyKeys and MouseKeys make your keyboard
and mouse pointer easier to control.

 - SoundSentry provides you with visual alerts and warnings.



Accessibility Options can be installed and configured from the
Control Panel.
